## Info


The goal of this project is to create prediction algorithm to highight a next word 
and to provide a user interface to that can be accessed by others

## Application

1. When the application is initially opened, Blank text is provided to enter the text and when clicked on below 3 predictions, it will display words
2. Once the user enters word/statement, it predicts the next words

## Output
1. Once the user enters the text in the text box, it predicts relavent 3 words in Guess1,2,3
